message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,500? This is still a good price for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not able to go above $8,000 for this product. I hope you can meet me at this price point.
